member.name: T:LteDev.Commands.Get_PSHelpXml
member.summary: Generates PowerShell help file from module information.
member.description: Gets information from the PowerShell module, including the DLL files, if the module is binary.

member.name: P:LteDev.Commands.Get_PSHelpXml.ModuleInfo
member.summary: Information about the module, which is used to generate parameter help.

member.name: P:LteDev.Commands.Get_PSHelpXml.Path
member.remarks: Using this parameter results in the module being loaded, if it not already loaded.

member.name: P:LteDev.Commands.Get_PSHelpXml.LiteralPath
member.summary: Literal path of module to load.
member.remarks: Using this parameter results in the module being loaded, if it not already loaded.

member.name: T:LteDev.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:LteDev.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:LteDev.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
